title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a slow-witted but kind-hearted man who witnesses and influences key historical events.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: A jnitor at MIT is a self-taught math genius who seeks help from a therapist to find direction in life.

title: Life Is Beautiful
description: A father uses humor and imagination to protect his son during the horrors of a Nazi concentration camp.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations in Gotham but faces a rising threat in the Joker.

title: The Green Mile
description: A death row corrections officer discovers a condemned man has supernatural powers.

title: The Pianist
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto during World War II.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker who rises to prominence through crime and corruption.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
